page.title: 06SPORT - GOLF and TENNIS
page.content:
The{Hoylake Municipal}and{Royal {Liverpool Golf Clubs}are situated in this area. The latter is a links course with superb views across Liverpool Bay to the Welsh coast. Many International tournaments are held here and the course is associated with many famous names in the golfing world.
There are three large, private tennis clubs with grass, shale and all weather courts. The mild climate permits play throughout the year. There are also several public grass and shale courts in the local parks.
